Job Title: Retail Store Associate 3rd Shift| $16.85 - Detroit Metro Airport Location, Paradies Lagardere

Location: Romulus, MI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Paradies Lagardere, the epitome of excellence in travel retail, invites passionate individuals to embark on an exciting journey as Sales Associates. Imagine not just a job, but an adventure where each day brings new opportunities and challenges within the vibrant atmosphere of airport retail.

This is a 3rd shift, overnight position at a store located in the Detroit Metro Airport. Shift time: 10pm - 6am

Why Paradies Lagardere?

What We Look For:

ğŸ’» Tech-Savvy: Efficiently and accurately conduct customer transactions on our advanced POS system.

Ready to Take Flight? Apply Today! If you're excited about joining a company that values your enthusiasm and commitment, apply now to become a Sales Associate at Paradies Lagardere. Your journey towards a fulfilling career starts here, where the sky is the limit.

Paradies Lagardere is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
